search.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'#content > div.searchbox.board.clearfix > ul > li');}
search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div > div.headline.clearfix > a');}
search.cover: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a > div > div.lazy-img > img@attr->data-echo');}
